header.title: ‘Sexist nonsense’ Caroline Lucas accused of ‘coup’ for all-female emergency cabinet demand
header.subtitle: CAROLINE LUCAS has called for an emergency all-female cabinet to block a no deal Brexit, but the move has been heavily criticised and branded a “ludicrous Parliamentary coup”.
header.postText: The Green MP has proposed that 10 high-profile female politicians should form a cabinet of national unity to block a no deal Brexit and seek legislation for a fresh referendum. The extraordinary proposal has been met with overwhelming criticism, as many branded the suggestion as “blatant sexism”. Others have criticised the cabinet for excluding women of colour, as all 10 of the MPs put forward are white.', 'Ms Lucas has asked a handful of female MPs to join her, including Labour’s Emily Thornberry, the Liberal Democrat leader, Jo Swinson, and SNP’s leader Nicola Sturgeon.', 'Writing in the Guardian, the Green MP said: “We need an ‘emergency Cabinet’ – not to fight a Brexit war but to work for reconciliation.', '“And I believe this should be a Cabinet of women.”', 'She went on to say any Cabinet could not include male members as in the past it was women who had shown they can bring an alternative approach to crises like the ongoing Brexit situation.', 'Ms Lucas said: “I believe women have shown they can bring a different perspective to crises, are able to reach out to those they disagree with and cooperate to find solutions.”', 'But the proposal has been heavily criticised on Twitter, with one user writing: “Is this really what our politicians should be doing?', '“Coming up with self indulgent and now sexist suggestions to subvert the democratic process?”', 'Another said: “I have a lot of time for Caroline but this is nonsense.”', 'A third wrote: “Caroline Lucas is launching a ludicrous Parliamentary coup which has no justification whatsoever.', '“On what basis can she claim that her all female, all remain voting Government would of National Unity?', '“The woman is clearly mad, as well as deluded.”', 'Others have called for Ms Lucas’ resignation: “Can we call on Caroline Lucas to resign for blatant sexism?', '“She’s just stereotyped a whole gender and then excluded another based on their gender.', '“This is not how MPs should act.”', 'Another simply asked: “Why exclude a political based on there sex?”', 'Politicians have also joined in on the criticism, with Tory MP Liz Truss asking: “Is there anything more sexist than claiming your gender determines your worldview/behaviour/attitude?”', The Green MP has also come under fire for excluding women of colour from the proposed cabinet.', 'Labour MP Chi Onwurah said it was “patronising” and added: “Including BAME women is not going some extra mile!”', 'Another person wrote: “Why no women of colour including the most senior woman in Labour Diane Abbott?”', 'The women invited to join Ms Lucas in the emergency cabinet are: Heidi Allen, Kirsty Blackman, Yvette Cooper, Sylvia Hermon, Liz Saville Roberts, Anna Soubry, Emily Thornberry, Jo Swinson, Nicola Sturgeon, Justine Greening.', 'Ms Thornberry has responded on Twitter, and said: “I will gladly stand on a stage with you and the other women” but said she was worried the new proposals “would not solve our country’s divisions”.', 'The other politicians are yet to publicly respond.

commentThread.commentText: This lady has a PhD and yet consistently spout drivel.

replies.commentText: I have a daughter who has a PhD in Molecular Biology and she is a very bright scientist so I don't think all PhDs are worthless but I agree there are some subjects that should not qualify for PhD study such as Sociology, Literature,  and many more besides which are a waste of 3-4 years.

I have worked with people with PhD's and they are no indication of intelligence, especially problem solving ability.  One PhD couldn't diagnose a fault with a domestic fuse box yes he's an ardent remainer, another totally perplexed by the counter weight system on a garage door!  People get PhDs for recording penguin behaviour.
Shows the worth of such as a Phd?
Most PhDs are drivel anyway. Also, she 's clearly more than a couple of sandwiches short of the full picnic!
Being able to pass an exam by training to remember the answers or writing a detailed paper on a subject don't mean much outside of them. Experience in said field and common sense rule.
Phd in English, so if you want an English teacher, she's your  gal. As for any other subject under the Sun...

But have you seen what her PhD is for? English from the University of Exeter awarded 1990 with a thesis entitled Writing for Women: a study of woman as reader in Elizabethan romance Not exactly rocket science is it ? More like a study of "bodice rippers" from Mills & Boon.
A PHD in Elizabethan Literature, not sure how that PHD has benefitted her
Most with PhD’s haven't a clue about reality, they cannot practically apply what they learnt

Having a PhD means you've read more books written by someone else than most people have. They've read books written by people whose views they share to start with, to reinforce their own prejudices. It doesn't make them clever, maybe just a little better educated, but being educated and being clever are not the same thing.
Correct.
Education is no substitute for common sense.
My brother has more letter than an alphabet after his name, does not mean he has much when to comes to common sense.
Physical disability, can't keep her mouth shut.
As is the case with so many 'intelligent ' and educated ...but, no common sense...!
horus - you know the Churchill quote? Precis: -"more & more about less & less until we know everything there is to know about nothing".

replies.commentText: Yet we had female leaders like Queen Elizabeths I & II, Queen Victoria, Margaret Thatcher.. it's not a leader's gender that matters rather it's where their loyalties are that makes the difference.. loyalty to Britain's sovereignty and independence is the deciding factor. As obvious examples both Tony Bliar and Con Major were recent male leaders who utterly sold out Britain to the unelected EU like the traitors they are, so that would rule out any future male and female leaders. That leaves us with those 'new' genders the likes of Caroline Lucas might insist we must believe in or be beheaded for apostasy. We need patriots loyal to Britain to secure our Brexit escape from the EU 's grasp regardless of any specifi c gender. Also Europe's disenfranchised people have their own potential saviours from both genders, with Marine Le Pen in France, Matteo Salvini in Italy, Geert Widers in the Netherlands, Frauke Petry in Germany, and so on. The enemy is the EU and its imported army of Islamic jihadists and third world chancers used to sow terror on a relatively peaceful continent in the twisted hope that Europe 's nation state democracies would then agree to surrender their armies to full EU control to counter the threat the EU itself deliberately unleashed. Pro-Western people of both genders need to stand united against t his common threat to our shared values.
